## Entity.hasComponent() method

Validate if a Component exists on this Entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasComponent(component: Component): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  component | Component | Component to validate if it exists on this Entity. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`true` if the Component exists on this Entity.
